node.html: A speed typing application that measures your typing speed against a countdown timer. This application gives you insight into your typing accuracy & speed.
A clone of the popular 2048 game implemented in pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The game has smooth animations and supports gameplay both on desktop and mobile.

A comic reading app built with Flutter. This mobile app combines a beautiful UI to read, download, and bookmark japanese comics. It has a powerful web scraping API built with Python Flask and an SQLite database for local storage.
A realtime chat applicatin built using Flutter and Firebase. It allows users to register and login using email and OAuth. Provides a clean interface with smooth animations.
A weather applicaiton built with Flutter that consumes the weather API. It has a clean and modern user interface.
A mobile app that calculates BMI using user data. Built using Flutter with a beautiful UI.
